meaning: fundamentals, radical (chem), counter for machines, foundation

onyomiExamples.meaning: group, (free) radical, counter for installed or mounted objects (e.g. stone lanterns, gravestones, satellites)
foundation of a temple, laying a foundation (stone), open base

kunyomiExamples.meaning: origin, source, base, basis, foundation, root, cause, ingredient, material, (somebody's) side, (somebody's) location, original cost (or capital, principal, etc.), (plant) root, (tree) trunk, first section of a waka, counter for blades of grass, tree trunks, etc., and for falcons (in falconry), handle (chopsticks, brush, etc.), grip

kunyomiExamples.reading: しっぱいはせいこうのもと
kunyomiExamples.meaning: failure teaches success, failure is a stepping-stone to success

kunyomiExamples.example: 生兵法は大怪我のもと
kunyomiExamples.reading: なまびょうほうはおおけがのもと
kunyomiExamples.meaning: a little learning is a dangerous thing
